working.position: Technical Project Manager / Chief of Staff
working.description: In this position, I operated on a vast spectrum of responsibilities. These include establishing and improving the company culture and communication between d4l and external stakeholders, facilitating retros, organising cross-functional teams, and planning and conceptualising new projects.

working.position: Junior Software Engineer & Product Owner YKaaS
working.description: In my position in the software team, I was involved in developing various applications for web, desktop, and iOS, including responsibility for UX/UI designs. Furthermore, as the Product Owner of „YPTOKEY as a Service, “I shaped the blockchain core product into a more tangible application for potential customers. I worked closely with our CEO and CTO to design a sustainable and scalable business model and its associated applications.
As an apple trained retail expert, I helped customers to make the best product decisions and helped them with their questions and software issues.

As co-founder, my primary responsibility is converting our vision, „...to make skills and knowledge more accessible...” into a sustainable product. My primary responsibilities were the planning and management of the technology and administrative process.
In this position, I developed a social media strategy and improved the existing customer feedback channels.

This project intended to develop a place where friends could follow their artistic interests. It included a yoga studio, a recording studio, a workshop facility, and a nightclub. It proved itself a valid business model by hosting an average of 200 people six nights a week. My responsibilities lay with administrative functions and technological resources.
